com.veepoo.protocol.model.settings

类 ContentSetting

  • com.veepoo.protocol.model.settings.ContentSetting
  • 直接已知子类:
    ContentPhoneSetting, ContentSmsSetting, ContentSocailSetting

    public class ContentSetting

    发送到手表的通知设置，它包含三个字类ContentSmsSetting,ContentPhoneSetting,ContentSocailSetting;

    ContentSmsSetting 发送信息内容时，使用此类

    ContentPhoneSetting 发送电话内容时，使用此类

    ContentSocailSetting 发送第三方App时，使用此类

    Created by timaimee on 2017/6/21.
